#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define sz(_v) (int)(_v).size()
#define all(_v) (_v).begin(),(_v).end()
#define pii pair<int,int>
typedef long long ll;
const int INF = 1000000000;
const ll MOD = 1e9 + 7;

const int maxn = 1000010;

int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

	int t; cin >> t;
	while (t --) {
		ll a,b; cin >> a >> b;
		ll g = __gcd(a,b);
		while (g != 1) {
			while (b % g == 0) b /= g;
			g = __gcd(g,b);
		}
		
		if(b == 1 and g == 1) puts("Yes");
		else puts("No");
	}
	return 0;
}
